alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 19 at 8:00AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TONIGHT... * Breezy trades of 25 to 35 mph gusting up to 40 mph will continue to impact all islands of American Samoa today.... * TIMING...through tonight. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 800 TAEAO ASO LULU IULAI 19 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU LE FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI SEIA OO I LE PO NANEI... * O savili o le tuaoloa e 25 i le 35 mph agi fa`ata`uta`u i le 40 mph o le a fa`aauau ona a`afia ai motu uma a Amerika Samoa i le aso... * TAIMI...seia oo i le po nanei * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 35 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi fa`ata`uta`u ai o le a taunuu mai i luga o le atunuu. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH with higher gusts are expected, especially at higher elevations. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
